Description of incident: Humana has notified Atlanta customers of a data breach that occurred when a Humana associate's vehicle was broken into and an unencrypted USB drive along with the associates lap top computer were stolen. The information contained on these devices included medical record information and Social Security Numbers.Humana said that it "has no reason to believe that the information  has been used inappropriately." The company is offering free  access to a credit-monitoring service for members who were affected."Members  enrolled in Medicare plans who have any questions about this may contact  Humana at 1-800-457-4708, from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Members enrolled in  non-Medicare plans should call 1-800-448-6262".
